examples.example: 这位主持人就像变色龙一样，能够巧妙地适应各种不同的节目风格和场合。

translate.english: This host is like a chameleon, being able to skillfully adapt to various different program styles and occasions.

examples.example: 他有着很强的适应能力，就像变色龙一样能够快速融入各种新环境。

translate.english: He has a very strong adaptive ability, just like a chameleon that can quickly blend into various new environments.

examples.example: 他是个聪明的人，就像变色龙一样能很好地适应各种复杂的人际关系。

translate.english: He is a smart person, just like a chameleon who can adapt well to all kinds of complex interpersonal relationships.
